sources.name: authenticity_audit_report
sources.description: Comprehensive authenticity audit report identifying 149 violations (9 FATAL, 140 WARN) across 8 detector types
sources.provenance: Generated by scripts/qa/authenticity_audit.py on 2025-10-26T23:12:40.467805Z using SCA v13.8 protocol
sources.usage: Input data for violation remediation; baseline for pre/post comparison

sources.name: authenticity_remediation_plan
sources.description: Phase-by-phase remediation strategy with 6 phases, effort estimates, and acceptance criteria
sources.provenance: Created by SCA agent on 2025-10-26 based on audit findings

sources.name: existing_codebase_violations
sources.description: Production and test code files containing the 149 identified violations
sources.usage: Target files for remediation across 6 phases

leakage_guards: Test isolation: Each infrastructure module tested independently with fixed seeds
No cross-phase dependencies: Phase N implementation does not depend on Phase N+1
Deterministic fixtures: All test fixtures pre-generated and version-controlled
Environment isolation: SEED, FIXED_TIME explicitly set in tests (no inheritance)
data_integrity.normalization: N/A (code remediation task, not data processing)
data_integrity.splits: N/A (not ML task; phases represent sequential remediation, not train/test splits)

validation_metadata.notes: All data sources identified, provenance documented, SHA256 computed for audit report. No PII in any source.
